Articles.Content:
So I've put upwards of 100 hours into ksp with no real issue I couldn't solve. Landed on the mun, landed on Minmus, etc. Started this playthrough and everything went well. This was up until last night. Normally when you put them on a craft, they stick out so you need to stow them right?  This time, they didn't. That was my first clue something was wrong. So i launch and go to the Mun, and as i come in to land, i try to deploy my gear. They won't deploy. I have sufficient charge and they should work fine, only they don't  activate. Not with the action group, not with G, and not even right clicking them manually. 

Okay, so maybe i installed them wrong. I go to the VAB and take them off and put on a different pair of struts. Still won't  deploy. Even while I'm in the VAB, I can't control them. In fact, when I go to action groups, they can be clicked on, but extend on/off and any other modes aren't  even available. 

The mods i have installed are Interstellar, Mechjeb, and ScanSAT incase it's  a compatibility thing.
